a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Solar (photovoltaic) panel prices vs. cumulative capacity

text.style: font-size: 14.625px; line-height: 1.2
text.tspan: Learning curve for solar panels. This data is expressed in US dollars per watt, adjusted for inflation. Cumulative
installed solar capacity is measured in megawatts.

text.style: font-size: 13.5px; line-height: 1
font-size: 13.5px; line-height: 1
font-size: 13.5px; line-height: 1.2
text.tspan: Data source: IRENA (2024); Nemet (2009); Farmer and Lafond (2016)

text.style: font-size: 13.5px; line-height: 1.2
text.tspan: Note: Data is expressed in constant 2023 US$ per watt.
